ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The material itself was very interesting. Doing the problem sets was often like solving a puzzle, which I enjoy. Problems with the class were more in presentation than content.
Because the instructor for this course will not be teaching it again at Yale, I don't think I can comment on what the course will look like in the future.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course provided some good background to phonology, and it may prove very useful to my work. However, I was disappointed in the way the course was taught, and it is more likely that this course has steered me away from research in phonology rather than toward it.
